snippet: In “New York Exposed,” Daniel Czitrom writes about a police scandal that transformed the city. “Chasing the Last Laugh,” by Richard Zacks, tells the story of Mark Twain’s book tour.
abstract: Sam Roberts reviews books New York Exposed: The Gilded Age Police Scandal That Launched the Progressive Era by Daniel Czitrom and Chasing the Last Laugh: Mark Twain’s Raucous and Redemptive Round-the-World Comedy Tour by Richard Zacks.
lead_paragraph: In “New York Exposed,” Daniel Czitrom writes about a police scandal that transformed the city. “Chasing the Last Laugh,” by Richard Zacks, tells the story of Mark Twain’s book tour.
